collectionID.subject: MHL.collectionID

context.subject: MHL.context
context.description: The schema context of the form (e.g. MY.document, MNP.namedPlace...)

fieldsFormID.description: Use fields, uiSchema and translations from the form

adminLockable.subject: MHL.adminLockable
adminLockable.description: Form admin can lock documents. Locked documents can't be edited
adminLockable.title: Document are lockable by admin

allowExcel.subject: MHL.allowExcel
allowExcel.description: Allows usage in spreadsheet upload component
allowExcel.title: Allow excel

cancelLabel.subject: MHL.cancelLabel
cancelLabel.description: Label for the cancel button at the form footer
cancelLabel.title: Footer cancel button label

disableRequestDescription.description: Theme form introduction page doesn't show description for the form permission request button
disableRequestDescription.title: Disable form permissionrequest description

displayOwnSubmissions.subject: MHL.displayOwnSubmissions
displayOwnSubmissions.description: Only if has named places. All documents for admin
displayOwnSubmissions.title: Display own submissions

documentsViewableForAll.subject: MHL.documentsViewableForAll
documentsViewableForAll.description: Documents of the form's collectionID are viewable for all users with form permissions to the form's collectionID
documentsViewableForAll.title: Documents are viewable for all users

draftLabel.subject: MHL.draftLabel
draftLabel.description: Label for the draft button at the form footer
draftLabel.title: Footer draft button label

emptyOnNoCount.subject: MHL.emptyOnNoCount
emptyOnNoCount.description: Units without count aren't considered in laji.fi viewer (including document viewers and datatables)
emptyOnNoCount.title: Consider unit without count empty

excludeFromGlobalExcel.subject: MHL.excludeFromGlobalExcel
excludeFromGlobalExcel.description: Excludes from the Vihko excel tools
excludeFromGlobalExcel.title: Exclude from global excel tools

footer.subject: MHL.footer
footer.title: Footer options
footer.description: Options for footer of the observation form

footerLogos.subject: MHL.footerLogos
footerLogos.description: Key is an image URI, value is the URI of the page clicking the image opens
footerLogos.title: Logos

formOwnSubmissionsLabel.subject: MHL.formOwnSubmissionsLabel
formOwnSubmissionsLabel.description: Label for the own submissions list at the header of document form
formOwnSubmissionsLabel.title: Own submissions page title

formPermissionDescription.subject: MHL.formPermissionDescription
formPermissionDescription.description: Shown at form permission intro page. Allows HTML
formPermissionDescription.title: Form permissions page description

hasAdmins.subject: MHL.hasAdmins
hasAdmins.description: The form has administrators. Administrators can handle user access permissions and admin roles for all forms with the collectionID of the form.
hasAdmins.title: Has admins

hideCancelButton.subject: MHL.hideCancelButton
hideCancelButton.description: Hides the cancel button at form footer
hideCancelButton.title: Hide cancel button

hideSaveButton.subject: MHL.hideSaveButton
hideSaveButton.description: Hides the save/edit button at form footer
hideSaveButton.title: Hide save button

hideTES.subject: MHL.hideTES
hideTES.description: Terms of Service is hidden at the header of observation form

hideTempButton.subject: MHL.hideTempButton
hideTempButton.description: Hides the draft button at form footer
hideTempButton.title: Hide draft button

mobile.subject: MHL.mobile
mobile.description: Form UI has a greeting page for convenient mobile usage
mobile.title: Use mobile UI

adminShowCopyLink.subject: MHL.adminShowCopyLink
adminShowCopyLink.description: Named place viewer shows button to copy the URL for the named place viewer
adminShowCopyLink.title: Show copy link for admin

allowAddingPublic.subject: MHL.allowAddingPublic
allowAddingPublic.description: Form users can create new named places for the form
allowAddingPublic.title: Allow adding public named places

birdAssociationAreaHelp.subject: MHL.birdAssociationAreaHelp
birdAssociationAreaHelp.description: Help text for bird association filter
birdAssociationAreaHelp.title: Bird association area help

chooseDescription.subject: MHL.chooseDescription
chooseDescription.description: Description shown at named place choose page. Allows HTML.
chooseDescription.title: Choose page description

copyLatestDocumentToNamedPlace.subject: MHL.copyLatestDocumentToNamedPlace
copyLatestDocumentToNamedPlace.description: The latest document is copied to named place's prepopulatedDocument. if documents date is same or after the current prepopulated document's date, or if prepopulated document doesn't have date. Date is checked from gatheringEvent or from gatherings

createDescription.description: Description shown above named place form when creating new named place. Allows HTML.

createNewButtonPrependingTextLabel.description: Label for text before new named place creation button at named place choose page

documentListUseLocalDocumentViewer.description: Theme own submissions page uses local document viewer (that shows more accurate data)

earlierLabel.title: Earlier document label (ADMIN)

editDescription.subject: MHL.editDescription
editDescription.description: Description shown at top of page when editing named place

includeDescendantCollections.description: True by default. The named places of this form includes the places of descendant collections also.
includeDescendantCollections.title: Include descendant collections

includeUnits.description: Named places will be fetched with units included (hard coded to work only for HR.2049)

infoFields.subject: MHL.infoFields
infoFields.description: Fields that named place viewer shows (if not defined will be digged from uiSchema["ui:options"].fieldsScopes[form collectionID])
infoFields.title: Info fields for viewer

lastCensusLabel.subject: MHL.lastCensusLabel
lastCensusLabel.description: Label for named place viewer last census
lastCensusLabel.title: Last census label

listColumnNameMapping.subject: MHL.listColumnNameMapping

listColumnNameMapping.title: List column names

listColumns.subject: MHL.listColumns
listColumns.description: List of columns visible in the list view
listColumns.title: Columns in list

listLabel.subject: MHL.listLabel
listLabel.description: Label for named place chooser list tab
listLabel.title: List label

mapOverlayNames.subject: MHL.mapOverlayNames
mapOverlayNames.description: Overlays that named place chooser map should show
mapOverlayNames.title: Map overlays

mapTileLayerName.subject: MHL.mapTileLayerName
mapTileLayerName.description: Tilelayer name that named place chooser map should show
mapTileLayerName.title: Map tilelayer

myEarlierLabel.subject: MHL.myEarlierLabel
myEarlierLabel.description: User label for named place viewer's document list
myEarlierLabel.title: Earlier document label (USER)

namedPlaceFormID.subject: MHL.namedPlaceFormID
namedPlaceFormID.description: Form ID of named place form (defaults to MHL.36)
namedPlaceFormID.title: Form ID

namedPlaceList.subject: MHL.namedPlaceList
namedPlaceList.description: Fields that named places list shows.
namedPlaceList.title: Named place list fields

prepopulatedDocumentFields.subject: MHL.prepopulatedDocumentFields
prepopulatedDocumentFields.description: When a new named place is created, the prepopulatedDocument will be populated according to this.
prepopulatedDocumentFields.title: Prepopulated document initialization

printLabel.subject: MHL.printLabel
printLabel.description: Label for print button of named place viewer
printLabel.title: Print button label

reservationUntil.subject: MHL.reservationUntil
reservationUntil.description: Places are reservable if defined. Value defines when the reservation should expire in ISO-8601. Example: ${year}-10-12
reservationUntil.title: Reservation expiration

showLegendList.subject: MHL.showLegendList
showLegendList.description: Named place list shows legend for the row colors
showLegendList.title: Show list colors legend

startWithMap.subject: MHL.startWithMap
startWithMap.description: Named place chooser view starts with map tab instead of list
startWithMap.title: Start with map tab

useAcceptedDocument.subject: MHL.useAcceptedDocument
useAcceptedDocument.description: Instead of populating observation form with prepopulatedDocument, it is populated with acceptedDocument. Admin can change the acceptedDocument from observation list
useAcceptedDocument.title: use accepted document

useLabel.subject: MHL.useLabel
useLabel.description: Named place viewer label for button for recording new observation
useLabel.title: Use place label

zoomToData.subject: MHL.zoomToData
zoomToData.description: Named place chooser map is initialized with data fitted in view.
zoomToData.title: Zoom to data

navigationTitle.subject: MHL.navigationTitle
navigationTitle.description: The title label for theme form sidebar
navigationTitle.title: Navigation title

ownSubmissionsActions.subject: MHL.ownSubmissionsActions
ownSubmissionsActions.description: Available actions for own submissions (only on the own submissions page). Defaults to ['edit', 'view', 'download', 'stats', 'delete']

ownSubmissionsAdminTitle.description: Shown at sidebar link and title of all submissions page
ownSubmissionsAdminTitle.title: Own submissions title

ownSubmissionsColumns.subject: MHL.ownSubmissionsColumns
ownSubmissionsColumns.description: Columns for own submissions (only on the own submissions page). Defaults to ['dateEdited', 'dateObserved', 'taxon', 'namedPlaceName', 'observer', 'id']

ownSubmissionsTitle.subject: MHL.ownSubmissionsTitle
ownSubmissionsTitle.description: Shown at sidebar link and title of all submissions page
ownSubmissionsTitle.title: Own submissions title

prepopulateWithInformalTaxonGroups.title: Prepopulate form data with data from informal taxon group

prepopulateWithTaxonSets.title: Prepopulate form data with data from taxon sets

enumNames: Not shown at all - used mainly to prevent spam
secureLevel.subject: MX.secureLevel
secureLevel.title: Secure level

DNASampleLocation.subject: MY.DNASampleLocation
DNASampleLocation.description: Leave empty if no sample taken, or if the sample is recorded separately
DNASampleLocation.title: DNA sample location

URL.subject: MY.URL
URL.description: URL where more information is available about the specimen
URL.title: URL

acquiredFrom.subject: MY.acquiredFrom
acquiredFrom.description: From who/where the specimen was acquired (if not recorded as a transaction)
acquiredFrom.title: Acquired from

acquiredFromOrganization.subject: MY.acquiredFromOrganization
acquiredFromOrganization.description: Organization where the accession was acquired from. If the organization is not on the list, add it first.
acquiredFromOrganization.title: Acquired from organization

acquisitionDate.subject: MY.acquisitionDate
acquisitionDate.description: Date (d.m.yyyy) or year (yyyy) on which the specimen was acquired to the collection. Empty means an old specimen acquired on an unknown date.
acquisitionDate.title: Acquisition date

additionalIDs.subject: MY.additionalIDs
additionalIDs.description: Other identifiers this specimen has, in format 'type:identifier'. For example: 'mzhtypes:123' (old MAZ-type number)
additionalIDs.title: Additional ID's

bold.subject: MY.bold
bold.description: BOLD identifier, usually BOLD Sample ID. You can include additonal comment by separating them with colon, e.g. "AY123456:comments here"
bold.title: BOLD

cladBookID.subject: MY.cladBookID
cladBookID.description: Clad book id number or such
cladBookID.title: Clad book id

cladSpecimenID.subject: MY.cladSpecimenID
cladSpecimenID.description: Clad specimen id: usually color description and a number
cladSpecimenID.title: Clad specimen id

cladVerbatim.subject: MY.cladVerbatim
cladVerbatim.description: Verbatim specimen data from clad book
cladVerbatim.title: Clad data verbatim

collectionID.subject: MY.collectionID
collectionID.description: The collection which this specimen belongs to
collectionID.title: Collection

condition.subject: MY.condition
condition.description: Notes on the defects of the specimen (missing parts or such). Empty value means same as "good" or "hyvä" - that there is nothing special to mention about the condition.
condition.title: Condition (defects)

cultivationInformation.subject: MY.cultivationInformation
cultivationInformation.description: Annuality/perenniality or other specialities about cultivation in our conditions.
cultivationInformation.title: Cultivation information

dataSource.subject: MY.dataSource
dataSource.description: Where the data about this specimen or observation is from, in addition to labels. Eg. reference to a publication, field notes or an expedition.
dataSource.title: Data source

documentLocation.subject: MY.documentLocation
documentLocation.description: Location of the specimen so that museum personnel can find it. E.g. taxon under which it is stored (if not clear from the identification), or shelf number
documentLocation.title: Specimen location

duplicatesIn.subject: MY.duplicatesIn
duplicatesIn.description: Description where duplicates (specimens of the same individual) are located or have been sent to and by which ID's.
duplicatesIn.title: Duplicates

editNotes.subject: MY.editNotes
editNotes.description: Reason for this edit or notes about it.
editNotes.title: Notes about this edit

entered.subject: MY.entered
entered.description: Date the data was first transcribed into electronic format or paper registry
entered.title: Date transcribed

event.subject: MY.event
event.description: Free-text diary-style information about what has been done to the specimen and when.
event.title: Event

exsiccatum.subject: MY.exsiccatum
exsiccatum.description: Name of the exsiccatum this specimen belongs to and possible exsiccatum number.
exsiccatum.title: Exsiccatum

formID.subject: MY.formID
formID.description: Id of the form that was used for the document
formID.title: Form id

id.subject: id
id.title: Id for the Global gathering event

@type.subject: @type
@type.title: Type for the Global gathering event

@context.subject: @context
@context.title: Context for the Global gathering event

enumNames: Artificial light in close proximity (closer than 10m)
Artificial light in moderate proximity (10 - 50 m)

invasiveControlOtherExpensesInEuros.title: Estimated of other expenses in euros

invasiveControlWorkHours.title: Work hours spent during the control

sykeButterFlyCensusWind.title: Windiness

sykeButterFlyCensusWindStart.title: Start windiness

enumNames: 1. Karu, metsä- tai suorantainen järvi tai lampi
2. Syvä, osittain rehevöitynyt järvi, lahdissa laajahkoja ruovikoita
3. Matala, metsä- tai suorantainen runsaskasvustoinen järvi tai lampi
4. Runsaskasvustoinen järvi maanviljelyksen tai asutuksen vaikutuspiirissä
6. Rehevähkö merenranta, jonkun verran ruovikoita (sekä matalia, että syviä rantoja)
7. Runsaskasvustoinen merenlahti (sekä matalia että syviä rantoja)
waterbirdHabitat.subject: MY.waterbirdHabitat
waterbirdHabitat.title: Habitat

leg.subject: MY.leg
leg.description: Name of the collector(s), in format 'Lastname, Firstname; Lastname Firstname'
leg.title: Leg

notes.subject: MY.notes
notes.description: Additional information to the data in each section.
notes.title: Notes

enumNames: All species identified, count is not estimated
taxonCensusType.subject: MY.taxonCensusType
taxonCensusType.title: Completeness of census

genbank.subject: MY.genbank
genbank.description: Genbank identifier. You can include additonal comment by separating them with colon, e.g. "AY123456:comments here"
genbank.title: Genbank

labelsVerbatim.subject: MY.labelsVerbatim
labelsVerbatim.description: All text from labels word-for-word, including spelling errors. Separate each label on its own row, starting from topmost label.
labelsVerbatim.title: Verbatim labels

language.subject: MY.language
language.description: Language the data is (mainly) written in, if applicable.
language.title: Language

legID.subject: MY.legID
legID.description: Collecting number (field identifier, keruunumero) for the specimen
legID.title: Collecting number

notes.subject: MY.notes
notes.description: Additional information to the data in each section.
notes.title: Notes

originalSpecimenID.subject: MY.originalSpecimenID
originalSpecimenID.description: Original catalogue number or other  original identifier of the specimen. E.g. H9000000
originalSpecimenID.title: Original catalogue number

plannedLocation.subject: MY.plannedLocation
plannedLocation.description: Garden area where this accession is planned to be located.
plannedLocation.title: Planned location

preservation.subject: MY.preservation
preservation.description: Main method of preservation. If parts of the specimen are preserved in different ways, you can choose several methods.
preservation.title: Preservation

primaryDataLocation.subject: MY.primaryDataLocation
primaryDataLocation.description: Location of the primary data if not Kotka.
primaryDataLocation.title: Primary data location

privateNotes.subject: MY.privateNotes
privateNotes.description: Notes shown within the system for users signed in but not shown publicly anywhere. Use only for notes that absolutely need to be hidden from public view.
privateNotes.title: Nonpublic notes

publication.subject: MY.publication
publication.description: Publication references or doi's that refer to this specimen
publication.title: Publications

relationship.subject: MY.relationship
relationship.description: Relationship to another taxon OR specimen. Choose relationship type as prefix and give taxon name or specimen identifier thereafter, e.g. "parasite: Parasiticus specius" OR "host:http://tun.fi/JAA.123"
relationship.title: Relationship

sampleHistory.subject: MY.sampleHistory
sampleHistory.description: The history of the specimen, for example how it was acquired or in which museums it has been before.
sampleHistory.title: Specimen history

separatedFrom.subject: MY.separatedFrom
separatedFrom.description: ID of the specimen from which this has been separated
separatedFrom.title: Separated from specimen

separatedTo.subject: MY.separatedTo
separatedTo.description: ID's of those new specimens that have been separated from this specimen
separatedTo.title: Separated to specimen(s)

enumNames: Unrecoverable (location known, bet can't get it back)
status.subject: MY.status
status.description: Empty value means same as "ok" - that there is not anything special about the status of the specimen.
status.title: Status

transcriberNotes.subject: MY.transcriberNotes
transcriberNotes.description: Additional information regarding the data entry or transcription process, e.g. unclarities, explanations for interpretations,
transcriberNotes.title: Transcriber's notes

transferAgreement.subject: MY.transferAgreement
transferAgreement.description: Common name of agreement concerning the transfer, if any.
transferAgreement.title: Transfer agreement

unreliableFields.subject: MY.unreliableFields
unreliableFields.description: List of those fields that contain unreliable data. The list is created automatically.
unreliableFields.title: Unreliable fields

verificationStatus.subject: MY.verificationStatus
verificationStatus.description: Information about the quality of the specimen data. Possible to select several.
verificationStatus.title: Verification status

voucherSpecimenID.subject: MY.voucherSpecimenID
voucherSpecimenID.description: Identifier of the herbarium voucher specimen or information about it if the identifier is unknown.
voucherSpecimenID.title: Voucher specimen ID

owner.subject: MZ.owner
owner.description: Team or organisation that owns the record and can edit it.
owner.title: Owner of record

publicityRestrictions.subject: MZ.publicityRestrictions
publicityRestrictions.description: PUBLIC: all data can be published; PROTECTED: exact locality is hidden (100*100km square); PRIVATE: most of the data is hidden. Empty value means same as public.
publicityRestrictions.title: Publicity restrictions

administrativeProvince.subject: MY.administrativeProvince
administrativeProvince.description: Regions, rayons, provinces and other administrative areas. Separate multiple names with commas, from generic to specific. (E.g. Etelä-Suomen lääni, Uusimaa)
administrativeProvince.title: Administrative province

alt.subject: MY.alt
alt.description: Altitude form sea level in meters, single value or range (E.g. 90, or 80-100). No GPS altitude here.
alt.title: Alt in meters

associatedObservationTaxa.subject: MY.associatedObservationTaxa
associatedObservationTaxa.description: Write associated observation taxa names here, separated by a semicolon (;). E.g.: "Betula pendula; Betula pubescens; Poaceae". These will form their own units of the type observation.
associatedObservationTaxa.title: Associated observation taxa

associatedSpecimenTaxa.subject: MY.associatedSpecimenTaxa
associatedSpecimenTaxa.description: Write associated specimen taxa names here, separated by a semicolon (;). E.g.: "Betula pendula; Betula pubescens; Poaceae". These will form their own units of the type Preserved specimen.
associatedSpecimenTaxa.title: Associated specimen taxa

enumNames: Stand of trees close to buildings

biologicalProvince.subject: MY.biologicalProvince
biologicalProvince.description: Formal abbreviation. For Finnish eliömaakunnat, use Finnish abbreviation.
biologicalProvince.title: Biogeographical province

collectingEventName.subject: MY.collectingEventName
collectingEventName.description: Name of an expedition or such.
collectingEventName.title: Collecting event name

coordinateRadius.subject: MY.coordinateRadius
coordinateRadius.description: Maximum error of coordinates in meters
coordinateRadius.title: Error radius in meters

coordinateSource.subject: MY.coordinateSource
coordinateSource.description: Use for NEW SPECIMENS: Where the coordinates have been acquired
coordinateSource.title: Coord source

enumNames: KKJ astekoord. = Finnish KKJ decimal (NOT PREFERRED)

Degrees minutes seconds, with unknown system (NOT PREF.)

coordinateSystem.title: Coordinate system

coordinatesVerbatim.subject: MY.coordinatesVerbatim
coordinatesVerbatim.description: Coordinates, possible coordinate system and error radius word-to-word as they appear on the label or other original source, errors and all.
coordinatesVerbatim.title: Verbatim coordinates from label or other original source

country.subject: MY.country
country.description: Country name in English, or 2-letter country code, or name from label
country.title: Country

dateVerbatim.subject: MY.dateVerbatim
dateVerbatim.description: Date just as it appears on the label or other original source, no interpretation, errors and all
dateVerbatim.title: Verbatim date from original source

depth.subject: MY.depth
depth.description: Depth in meters, single value or range (E.g. 0.9, or 0.8-1.0)
depth.title: Depth in meters

enumNames: Herb-rich forest with broadleaved deciduous trees
Mountain birch forest (excluding herb-rich mountain birch forest)
Graminoid dwarf shrub rock outcrop and scree
Rock outcrop and scree deficient of trees
Calcareous rock outcrop and quarry, bare calcareous land
Rural biotopes and cultural habitats or other human-impacted environment
Roadsides (verges, banks, on the road etc.)

enumNames: Number of breeding sites (rocks, cavities, etc.)

additionalIDs.subject: MY.additionalIDs

age.subject: MY.age

age.title: Age

ageNotes.subject: MY.ageNotes
ageNotes.description: E.g. how age was determined, by whom and when.
ageNotes.title: Age notes

enumNames: 1 Unlikely breeding; Observed an individual of the species during the breeding season, but the observation does not suggest breeding in the respective atlas square

2 Possible breeding; Observed a single bird in one day (e.g. singing or displaying male, observed female) in the breeding season in a possible nesting habitat of the species, and breeding of the species in the atlas square is possible. Either the place was visited only once, or the bird was observed only once despite several visits.
3 Possible breeding; Observed a pair in one day in the breeding season in a possible nesting habitat, and breeding of the species in the atlas square is possible
4 Probable breeding; Observed a singing, displaying, or otherwise persistently staying male in the same place (i.e. on a permanent territory) on at least two days in the same breeding season
5 Probable breeding; Observed a female or a pair staying in the same place on at least two days in the same breeding season
6 Probable breeding; Observed a bird or pair in the breeding season in a manner strongly suggesting breeding
61 Probable breeding; A bird or a pair frequently visits a probable nesting site (e.g. regularly lands in the same reed bed or island)
62 Probable breeding; A bird or a pair builds a nest (digs or excavates a nest hole, carries nesting material, etc.)
63 Probable breeding; A bird or a pair gives warning calls because the nest or brood is apparently nearby
64 Probable breeding; A bird or a pair performs injury feigning such as broken-wing display or otherwise attempts to distract the observer away apparently from the nest or brood
65 Probable breeding; A bird or a pair dive-bombs or behaves otherwise threateningly toward the observer (e.g. owls and terns) because the nest or brood is apparently nearby
66 Probable breeding: Seen a nest with fresh nesting material (e.g. decorated nests of raptors) or food remains; however, no definite proof of eggs or chicks.
7 Confirmed breeding; Observed indirect evidence of confirmed breeding
71 Confirmed breeding; Seen used nest with eggs or eggshells, dead brood or remains of chicks, “dandruff” from feather sheaths etc., indicating that breeding occurred in the same year

72 Confirmed breeding; Observed a bird entering or leaving a nest in a way that clearly indicates breeding (although eggs or chicks have not been seen or chicks not heard, e.g. high nests or nest holes)
73 Confirmed breeding; Observed recently fledged young (nidicolous species) or downy young (nidifugous species) that can be considered born within the atlas square
74 Confirmed breeding; Observed an adult carrying or transporting food for young or a faecal sac, and the nest can be considered situating within the atlas square
75 Confirmed breeding; Adult seen incubating in the nest
8 Confirmed breeding; Observed direct evidence of confirmed breeding
81 Confirmed breeding; Direct evidence of a verified breeding detected: Nest with young heard (e.g. high nests or nest holes).
82 Confirmed breeding; Direct evidence of a verified breeding detected: Seen eggs or living young in the nest.
atlasCode.subject: MY.atlasCode
atlasCode.title: Breeding index

causeOfDeath.subject: MY.causeOfDeath
causeOfDeath.description: Cause of death, if not intentionally trapped on sampled
causeOfDeath.title: Cause of Death

chemistry.subject: MY.chemistry
chemistry.description: Results of chemical reaction tests etc.
chemistry.title: Chemical properties

count.subject: MY.count
count.description: Numeric or other description on the amount of individuals (or sprouts, fruiting bodies or such) in the specimen. Sexes and juveniles can be specified like so: 1m2f3j (=1 male, 2 females, 3 juveniles)
count.title: Count

decayStage.subject: MY.decayStage

enumNames: E - spreading in the wild, cultivated origin
TE - alien, spreading in the wild, cultivated origin
TVE - alien, resident, spreading in the wild, cultivated origin
TOVE - alien, old, resident (archaeotype), cultivated origin
TNVE - alien, new, resident, cultivated origin
TNSE - alien, new, ephemeral, cultivated origin
H - short distance escape from cultivation (inside a garden or similar)
